value:
$nMPID_サナキ|I wonder... Could I create a world
where the laguz and beorc live
together too?

$nMPID_サナキ|Begnion was founded by none other
than my great forbear, the empress
Altina, of the Three Heroes.

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Sanaki is fortunate. She is surrounded
by so many who adore her.

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|You say you're the...37th empress?
I am suddenly weary with the weight
of time's passing.

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Our fight was not in vain. Looking at
Sanaki and the rest, I feel that in the
core of my being.

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Shall we explore this castle, Sanaki?
I am sure our friend won't mind,
will you, $Nu?

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|The powers granted by the Goddess
of Dawn live on in my line, and will
continue far into the future!
$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Are you still in one piece, Sanaki?

$nMPID_サナキ|Lady Altina must not see me acting
like such a coward!

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Sanaki, can you feel it? With this,
we can grow even stronger!

My name is Altina. And this is my
descendant, Sanaki.

$nMPID_サナキ|Lady Altina always wished for the
beorc and the laguz to band together
and create a peaceful world...$k$pBut as time went on, the people
of the continent moved counter
to Altina's wishes...$k$p$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Sanaki, it's nothing to worry yourself
over. My dream for Tellius and the
seeds of my hope live on.$k$pWhen we accept each other and
value our differences, we can make
progress, no matter our tribes.$k$p$nMPID_サナキ|Lady Altina...$k$p$nMPID_神階オルティナ|And I believe you can help build
that new future as well—for all
Heroes, $Nu.
Yah
A gift for you.
Eeeek
Oh no...
You fool...
$nMPID_二人|Hear our prayer!
$nMPID_二人|A blessing... From the Goddess!
$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Let us celebrate!
$nMPID_サナキ|I shall bestow a gift.
But, the gifts...
Oh, what fun!
Let me see!

Glory...
...to Begnion!

The two of us together.

Of course!
Yes.

You look nice.

Do I?
Who shall I begin with...
For you.
Look! Snow!

$nMPID_サナキ|Are you... You're Lady Altina, right?
You founded the Begnion Empire.

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|That is correct. And you are mine and
Lehran's... Oh my! Let me have a look
at you.

Hmm... You certainly have my hair.
And I see traces of his face in yours...

$nMPID_サナキ|You're making me blush,
Lady Altina...

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Oh! My apologies. It's just... I'm
so very pleased to meet you.

$nMPID_サナキ|You are? Oh...um... You should know
something. I'm not the apostle you
think I am.
$nMPID_神階オルティナ|What ever do you mean?

$nMPID_サナキ|Well, the truth is... I cannot hear
the goddess's voice. My abilities
are...unremarkable.

But you... You were able to defeat
Yune!$k$pAnd generations of apostles were
able to predict disasters. I have
nothing like that.

Yet I still call myself apostle... Lady
Altina, I am so sorry.

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|What are you saying? You are alive
and in good health. What more could
I wish of you?
$nMPID_サナキ|Lady Altina?

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|Let me tell you what I would wish
for instead of a peaceful night of
gift giving.

$nMPID_サナキ|Wh-what is it? I'll do whatever
I can to help!

$nMPID_神階オルティナ|I would wish simply to hold you, and
to comfort you, as a mother does
her beloved child.

$nMPID_サナキ|Oh. If that's all you want, then—oh
my! How impetuous you are!

Mm... Actually, this is really nice.
Thank you.
